titleStmt.title: Great king protect vs with thy gratious hand, Or else Armenius will o're spred this land ..

notesStmt.note: A petition to King Charles I against the doctrines of Arminius.
Engraving with letterpress verses printed on the margin below.
The engraving, with imprint date altered to 1641 and with the verses engraved with added heading: "Englands Petition, ..", also appears as Wing E3011--STC.
Title from first line of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
